content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the conservationist approach to the environment that emerged in the Progressive Era?

choices.label: Designation of national parks and forests for recreation and managed use
Use of federal money to clean up polluted industrial sites
Passage of legislation banning the use of pesticides in agriculture
Passage of legislation to ensure clean air and waterways
Preservation of both land and wildlife in pristine condition

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
